alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 12:56AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Isolated High Winds Early This Morning... Isolated high winds with the strongest gusts up to 65 mph are possible through around the 4 AM time frame this morning. While these gusts will be possible over portions of the I-25 corridor, the highest chances will be for areas adjacent to the higher terrain. Those traveling on north south oriented roads should be prepared for isolated stronger cross winds, before these winds diminish later this morning.
